p: (a) Thoracic TB (T1/2-T12/L1) confirmed by postoperative pathological examination. (b) Single-segmental thoracic TB with age >18 years. (c) Underwent one stage posterior debridement, bone graft fusion, and internal fixation. (d) Underwent granular bone graft or transverse process bone graft. (e) Follow-up time >12 months. (f) Clinical and imaging data were complete.
